Posts.Content: Maharjan wrote: I am 38 years old, post mastectomy and post chemotherapy for triple negative stage 1a breast cancer, its been 2 years of my surgery. I am in regular follow up and touchwood, things are going well except for weaknesa. Recently in last few months, my menstrual cycles are getting shorter, am gettimg periods every 25 days, i am worried, please help me out Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Early menstruation Maharjan MelissaDallas
